name: Flowy Racerback Tank with Feathers (Dark Heather Gray)
description:
Our new Racerback tanks are even softer and silkier than the old ones! Made of a triblend of Viscose Poly Cotton, they are durable, lightweight and flow beautifully. A-line shape and a gathered back make for a slightly more feminine cut.

Our hand-drawn, hand-printed floating feathers design in white ink is perfect for daydreaming on summer afternoons.

name: Baltimore Neighborhoods Tee
description:
A hand drawn font explosion, saluting our fair city. Of all the city motto's that Baltimore has been given, "Greatest City In America" is our absolute favorite. It's humbly proclaimed by Baltimore's park benches and citizens alike, and sung from the rooftops by children across Maryland!

printed in White water-based, low toxicity ink on a sweatshop free, ladies (or unisex!) tshirt in lovely Heather Plum! These tees are incredibly comfy, but run small. If you're normally a medium, we strongly suggest ordering a large.

Super lightweight 50/50 "vintage feel" fabric (50% Polyester / 50% Cotton) and great construction. The Polyester retains shape and elasticity; Cotton lends both comfort and durability. Runs small and drapes against the body for a slimming look. This is everything you love about the fit, feel and durability of a vintage T-shirt, in a brand new version.

name: Cat Lover Flowy Racerback Tank (Black)
description:
Our ruche backed tanks are even softer and silkier than the old ones! Made of a triblend of Viscose Poly Cotton, they are durable, lightweight and flow beautifully. A-line shape and a gathered back make for a slightly girlier cut.

This cat friendly design is hand printed in waterbased white ink. 

Runs true to size
Printed in Baltimore
Scroll down to see a size chart of this style

name: Olive 3/4 Sleeve Tee with Herb Garden Print
description:
Back by popular demand: the 3/4 sleeve jersey cotton boatneck tees have arrived just in time for fall, and we've printed them with brand new designs!

Our nature inspired herb garden design is printed by hand in waterbased (low toxicity) antique white ink on Olive fabric.
 
These tees feature a wide scoopneck and 3/4 length sleeves with a great fit - sure to flatter any body type! They do run a bit small, so we recommend ordering a size up and/or consulting our size chart in the images to the left.

name: Navy 3/4 Sleeve Tee with Cotton Print
description:
Back by popular demand: the 3/4 sleeve jersey cotton boatneck tees have arrived just in time for fall, and we've printed them with brand new designs!

Our folk inspired cotton plant is printed by hand in waterbased (low toxicity) antique white and clover green inks.
 
These tees feature a wide scoopneck and 3/4 length sleeves with a great fit - sure to flatter any body type! They do run a bit small, so we recommend ordering a size up and/or consulting our size chart in the images to the left.

name: Purple 3/4 Sleeve Tee with Lovebirds
description:
These two folksy love birds are printed by hand in waterbased (non-toxic) antique white ink to remind you that showing love and kindness is more powerful and important than anything else.

These tees feature a wide scoopneck and 3/4 length sleeves with a great fit - sure to flatter any body type! They do run a bit small, so we recommend ordering a size up and/or consulting our size chart in the images to the left.

This tee is a lovely deep purple shade - perfect for purple friday in Baltimore.

name: Wild flower Field Triblend Pullover (Heather Emerald)
description:
We love this Emerald Green pullover in comfy medium/lightweight tri-blend fabric! Lighter weight than a normal sweatshirt, but slightly heavier than our tri-blend tees. Loose on top and fitted at the waist for a really great drape and comfortable style.
Raglan Sleeves. Bottom hem hits at waistline.

Hand printed with our two color, Wildflower Field design - an original drawing inspired by spring in Baltimore.

Runs true to size.
Scroll down to see size chart for this style. 
MADE IN USA

name: Wheatgrass Jersey Cotton Scarf (Dusty Rose)
description:
Healthy wheatgrass grows on this soft, breathable, 100% fine jersey cotton fabric scarf in Dusty Rose. 
Scarves are approximately 8' long by 16" wide and have unfinished, rolled edges. 
This hand drawn wheat design is printed on each end in a soft gray water based screenprinting ink.

Your scarf was made in Baltimore, and printed by hand in our cozy Baltimore studio.
So comfy, you won't want to take it off. 
One Size Fits All!

name: Lotus Garden Eco-Heather Pullover (Vintage Red)
description:
Lovely lotus blossoms bloom on this Vintage Red pullover in soft lightweight eco-blend heather fabric. Lighter than a sweatshirt, slightly heavier than our tri-blend tees, and made with a feel-good blend of sustainable fabrics.

Loose on top, fitted at the waist for a really great drape and comfortable style. 
Raglan Sleeves. 
Bottom hem hits just below waistline.

Hand printed in water based non-toxic ink with our two color (white and dark navy) Lotus design - an original drawing inspired by blooming flowers and folk art.

Runs true to size. 
Scroll down to see size chart for this style.
Printed in Baltimore

name: Seeds & Pebbles Jersey Scarf (Black)
description:
Hand sketched seeds & pebbles design in white ink on a 100% fine jersey cotton scarf in deep black. 
Image measures a little over 12," and is printed on both ends.
Scarves are approximately 8' long by 16" wide and have unfinished, rolled edges.

Perfect for men AND women
So comfy, you won't want to take it off.
One Size Fits All!

name: Cat Lover Scarf - Navy
description:
This Cat Lover's design is printed in white water based screenprinting ink on each end of this soft, breathable, Navy Blue 100% fine jersey cotton fabric scarf. Measures 15" wide by about 8 feet long. 

This Scarf is made in Baltimore, and printed by hand in our cozy Baltimore studio, just for you.
So comfy, you won't want to take it off. 
One Size Fits All!

name: Cat Lovers Heather Gray TriBlend Tee
description:
Proud felines amble across this Heather Gray Tri Blend Tee. 
Printed in blue water-based, low toxicity ink on a sweatshop free, tri-blend ladies tshirt. 
These tees are incredibly comfy, and run slightly small. If you're normally a medium, we strongly suggest ordering a large.

Tri-Blend (50% Polyester / 25% Cotton / 25% Rayon) construction 
Polyester retains shape and elasticity; Cotton lends both comfort and durability; addition of Rayon makes for a unique texture and drapes against the body for a slimming look. 
everything you love about the fit, feel and durability of a vintage T-shirt, in a brand new version.

name: Cotton Blend A-Line High Waisted Skirt with Lotus Print (Navy)
description:
We're thrilled to introduce our very first garment designed, cut, sewn, photographed and printed ENTIRELY in Baltimore!!

Our new A-line skirts can be worn with or without a belt, or with the waist folded down for a shorter fit. 
They are made of comfy stretch cotton (95% cotton, 5% lycra) and are about 23" long. 
This Navy blue skirt is printed in waterbased Green and White inks - all by hand in our Baltimore Studio.

name: Cotton Print Forest Heather 50/50 Tee
description:
Our folk inspired Cotton design printed in Navy & White water based, low toxicity ink on a sweatshop free, ladies tshirt in lovely Forest Green Heather. These tees are incredibly comfy, but run small. If you're normally a medium, we strongly suggest ordering a large.

Super lightweight 50/50 "vintage feel" fabric (50% Polyester / 50% Cotton) and great construction. The Polyester retains shape and elasticity; Cotton lends both comfort and durability. Runs small and drapes against the body for a slimming look. This is everything you love about the fit, feel and durability of a vintage T-shirt, in a brand new version.

name: Love Birds Eco-Heather Pullover (Gray)
description:
playful turtle doves soar across this heather gray pullover in soft lightweight eco-blend fabric. Lighter than a sweatshirt, slightly heavier than our tri-blend tees, and made with a feel-good blend of sustainable fabrics.

Loose on top, fitted at the waist for a really great drape and comfortable style. 
Raglan Sleeves. 
Bottom hem hits just below waistline.

Hand printed in water based non-toxic ink with our Turtle Dove design - an original drawing inspired by Indian folk art.

Runs true to size. 
Scroll down to see size chart for this style.
Printed in Baltimore

name: Herb Garden Scarf (Pale Blue)
description:
A garden of fresh green herbs grows happily on either end of this super comfy jersey cotton scarf in Pale Blue. Perfect for drinking tea, tackling your favorite autumn activities, or stretching out with a good book.

Our scarves are approximately 8' long by 16" wide and have unfinished, rolled edges. 
This hand drawn herbal collection is printed on each end in bright green water based (non-toxic) screenprinting ink.

So comfy, you won't want to take it off. 
One Size Fits All!

name: Organic Cotton Bouquet Print Scoopneck Tee (Natural)
description:
Last chance to get our organic cotton scoop neck tees with hand drawn, two color floral print in Magenta and Deep Royal Blue.

Screenprinted by hand in waterbased (low toxicity) ink in our home studio in Baltimore. 
Sizes run a little small! If you're normally a size Medium, we suggest ordering a large.

name: Unicorn
description: 9"x12" High quality digital print on archival 100% cotton letra paper. This print is a reproduction of an original gouche and ink painting by Rachel Bone. It is signed in pencil by the artist at the bottom righthand corner. The original painting as well as all reproductions sold on this site are created in Baltimore, MD and copyright Rachel Bone. Please allow 5-10 days for your print to ship. All art prints are made to order, and ship in a stay-flat mailer. To see more of Rachel's paintings, visit www.rachelbone.com

name: "Y" - The Paper Dolls - 8x10 archival print
description:
From Rachel Bone's 2010 alphabet series "I Bet You"

This print can either be seen as the letter Y, or as a women showing off her freshly cut paper dolls.

For the woman who makes lemonade from lemons, and art out of junk mail. She is the craftiest person you know - a clever & talented designer. Witty, kind and approachable. Known & loved by all.

A reminder to turn off your computer, pick up a pencil and make things!

Digital 100% Archival print on white paper. 8" x 10". 
Originally painted in gouache on wood panel, 2010.

name: Wildflower Field Tee in Heather Navy
description:
Our folksy wildflower field design, now hand-printed in Green & White water based, low toxicity ink on a sweatshop free, tri-blend ladies tshirt in Heather Navy Blue. 
These tees are incredibly comfy, and run slightly small. If you're normally a medium, we suggest ordering a large.

Tri-Blend (50% Polyester / 25% Cotton / 25% Rayon) construction

everything you love about the fit, feel and durability of a vintage T-shirt, in a brand new version.

name: Organic Cotton Queen Annes Lace LS Scoopneck Tee - (Earth Ocean)
description:
Our organic cotton scoop neck tees with extra long sleeves.
Printed in small batches with a queen anne's lace design. This plant pattern was made by laying Queen Anne's Lace from our Baltimore garden directly on the screen and exposing it. Shirt is Earth Ocean blue.

Screenprinted by hand in waterbased (low toxicity) white ink in our home studio in Baltimore.

name: Secret
description: 14"x18" High quality digital print on archival 100% cotton letra paper. This print is a reproduction of an original gouche and ink painting by Rachel Bone. name: Tulip Tree Moroccan Tank (Indigo)
description:
A tulip tree branch blossoms on this soft, easy-fit moroccan tank top. 
Crafted of classic 100% Cotton Jersey, this breezy tank is detailed with a slit neckline and blind stitching on sleeves and bottom hem.

Printed in water based non-toxic white ink 
by hand in Baltimore, MD

name: Herb Garden Flowy Racerback Tank (pebble)
description:
Our herb garden print is hand printed in waterbased white ink on this  Flowy, lightweight triblend tank. 
These tanks are ultra thin, great for layering. Made of tri-blend Viscose Poly Cotton. Durable and flow beautifully. A-line shape and a gathered back make for a girlier cut Great for all body shapes & sizes!

Runs true to size.

name: Turtledove Jersey Cotton Scarf (navy)
description:

Scarves are approximately 8' long by 16" wide and have unfinished, rolled edges.

This scarf is made in Baltimore, and printed by hand in our cozy Baltimore studio, just for you.

name: Organic Cotton Floral Lace L/S Scoopneck Tee (Asphalt)
description:

Printed in small batches with a hand drawn floral lace design. Inspired by folk art, nature, and indian textile prints. Shirt is asphalt gray.

Screenprinted by hand in waterbased (low toxicity) white ink in our home studio in Baltimore.
Sizes run a little small.

name: Cat Lover Ballerina Capsleeve Tee (Dusty Rose)
description:
Proud felines sunbath across this Dusty Rose ballerina tee, made of blissfully soft cotton with short feminine cap sleeves and a rounded bottom hem. Crafted of classic 100% Cotton Jersey, this comfortable tee is bound to be an instant favorite all year long, worn alone or paired with your favorite button up. Great for movement, comfort, lounging and stretching. Live your life without restrictions today.

100% Cotton 
Printed with waterbased non-toxic indigo blue ink 
by hand in Baltimore, MD.

name: The Entrepreneurs 11x14 Gicle Print
description:
A signed high quality art print on acid-free white 100% Cotton paper. 
11" x 14" unframed.

Print of an original gouache & ink painting by Rachel Bone, 2009
Ships Flat in a paper mailer.

So that we can ensure a clean, untarnished print, All of our paper products are made-to-order. Please allow 5-10 business days for your order to arrive.

name: Tribal Print Triblend Pullover (Heather Navy)
description:

Hand printed with our two-headed Eagle design - an original drawing inspired by the folk art of the Lenape Indians in Pennsylvania & New Jersey. Printed in waterbased (low toxicity) white ink.

Sizes run a little larger than our other styles.

name: Organic Cotton Wheat print L/S scoopneck tee (Natural)
description:
Our organic cotton scoop neck tees with extra long sleeves.

Screenprinted by hand in waterbased (low toxicity) soft blue-gray ink in our home studio in Baltimore. 
Sizes run a little small. If you are normally a size Medium, we suggest a ordering a size Large.

name: "P" - The Kitchen - 8x10 archival print
description:
From Rachel Bone's 2010 alphabet series "I Bet You"

This print can either be seen as the letter P, or as a woman in the midst of baking.
For the above-average chef, the lover of cooking and baking. The cake decorator and DIY enthusiast. She makes her bread from scratch, using grains you've never even heard of. 
She never misses the farmer's market, eats organic & local, and makes vegetarian taste better than carnivorous. She's not afraid of adding extra olive oil. 
She might show up to a party with flour in her hair, but she's sure to bring the best dish.

She's a keeper.

Digital 100% Archival print on white paper. 8" x 10". 
Originally painted in gouache on wood panel, 2010.

name: Organic Cotton Cuckoo Clock Scoopneck Tee - (Bark)
description:
Our brand new organic cotton short sleeve scoop neck tees printed in small batches with an original hand drawn cuckoo clock design. Inspired by folk art and scandinavian home goods. 

Screenprinted by hand in waterbased (low toxicity) white ink in our home studio.
Sizes run a little small

name: "A" - The High Five - 8x10 archival print
description:
From Rachel Bone's 2010 alphabet series "I Bet You"

This print can either be seen as the letter A, or as two women triumphantly high fiving. 
Perfect for any celebration, congratulation, or declaration of friendship.

Digital 100% Archival print on white paper. 8" x 10".
Originally painted in gouache on wood panel, 2010.

name: "C" - The Swing - 8x10 archival print
description:
From Rachel Bone's 2010 alphabet series "I Bet You"

This print can either be seen as the letter C, or as a women sailing carefree in the air on a tree swing. 
For lovers of vintage clothing & photography, fashion, children's games, who fondly remember swinging on rope swings and swimming in lakes. 
The independent and carefree. Those who remember to have fun.

Digital 100% Archival print on white paper. 8" x 10".
Originally painted in gouache on wood panel, 2010.

name: "G" - The Laundry - 8x10 archival print
description:
From Rachel Bone's 2010 alphabet series "I Bet You"

This print can either be seen as the letter G, or as a women hanging out a basket of laundry the old fashioned way.
She is the environmentalist, the head of the house, the clean freak, the maker of her own clothing. She knows every folk song, she bakes & sews and is modest about being better than anyone at everything she tries. She lives simply and loves life. No drama. All sunshine. 

Digital 100% Archival print on white paper. 8" x 10". 
Originally painted in gouache on wood panel, 2010.

name: "W" - The Stilts - 8x10 archival print
description:
From Rachel Bone's 2010 alphabet series "I Bet You"

This print can either be seen as the letter W, or as a woman walking on children's stilts. 

Funny and daring, she's not afraid to play kids games or be seen doing summersaults. She loves bright colors and pictures of birds. 
She's a good one to have around.

Digital 100% Archival print on white paper. 8" x 10". 
Originally painted in gouache on wood panel, 2010.

name: "X" - The Gymnist - 8x10 archival print
description:
From Rachel Bone's 2010 alphabet series "I Bet You"

This print can either be seen as the letter X, or as a woman doing stretches.
For the athletic, free spirit who still wears her 80's sweatbands Jane Fonda style while warming up. She's gearing up to obliterate world record speeds & distances, and she's having fun doing it.

Digital 100% Archival print on white paper. 8" x 10". 
Originally painted in gouache on wood panel, 2010.
